body:
Chris, Giobuttu,

Thanks for the fast response!

Chris: I uploaded the def and the epw file. Just insert a surface in the input to see the results.

Giobuttu: I downloaded the file from [here](http://apps1.eere.energy.gov/buildings/energyplus/cfm/weather_data3.cfm/region=4_north_and_central_america_wmo_region_4/country=MEX/cname=Mexico) (this is were the LadyBug_download_EPW component takes you). Supposedly mexico city has coordinates, latitude: 19.431255, Longitude: -99.135475 ([here](http://itouchmap.com/latlong.html)). The Epw file says: latitude: 19.43, longitude: -99.08, so they seem to match up.

Anyway thanks guys for taking a look!
